amendment.description: Amendment requires the Task Force report to include information and recommendations on developing new non-opioid forms of pain relief.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 14 printed in Part A of House Report 114-551 to expand the task force report to include information and recommendations on developing new non-opioid forms of pain relief.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Welch amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Welch amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A014) offered by Mr. Welch.
